REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0149 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-GIV 03-09 0053

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET GIVEN LATE HELP WORTH 15 MLN STG
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it provided the market with unspecified late assistance worth 15 mln stg. It has given the market total assistance of 228 mln stg today compared with a liquidity shortage it estimated at a revised 300 mln stg. REUTER
